Name: Security Half-Measure
Description: On Relic Use, sacrifices 15% of Max Health and grants a SHIELD for 10% of the wearer's Max Health to allies within 8m. Conversion cannot kill wearer. Lasts 15s.
Location: To optain:use the glider to the left of "Waylaid Conservatory"worldstone. glide around the buildings to the left. You should glide though a tight gap. After that there is a tornado to lauch you up to a small platform near "mucid terrarium"dungeon. Go inside the room and collect the ring.
